subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Trott of England was named the International Cricket Council cricketer of the year. He compiled 1,042 runs at an average of 65.12 in 12 tests.
snippet: Jonathan Trott of England was named the International Cricket Council cricketer of the year. He compiled 1,042 runs at an average of 65.12 in 12 tests.
